item.description:
Hi Everyone ,

Its that time again to help our friends with Appalachian Mountain Club , "AMC" . These are the folks who maintain the trails we all love to hike on . So its pay back time . We have almost 2,000 members in this club . I am looking for 40 of you that want to come out and get dirty and  help on a project you and your fellow hikers will enjoy for years to come . Myself and the other organizers never ask for anything in return for the hikes we post except knowing you enjoyed yourself or perhaps a simple thank you . So I am asking now for something in return  .We need your help .  . Its not easy work so please be prepared . It will be  hot , you will be sweating , you might even cry and ask why I came here .In the end you will know why . We are not moving mountains , well at least not this time .Kidding aside this a great project to be a part of .So please come on out and give us a hand .There will be other events like this later in the year were we ask again .Bring plenty of water and a lunch.

See you soon ,

Tony

Please read the following description from Chris Shafer from the AMC .

Sat Jun 1 National Trails Day Trail Project New

Join Narragansett chapter trails committee starting at 9 AM, in making improvements to the Narragansett trail. We will be building two-stringer lumber bridges to span wet areas, re-route a small section of the trail, and attempt some drainage of a few wet areas. Bring lunch, water, work gloves (or we loan a pair to you), and wear boots or equivalent with a good tread. Rain date Sun. June 2

group.name: Rhode Island Hiking Club " Walks and Rambles "

item.name: National trails day project at Camp Yawgoog , Blood ,Sweat and Tears
